title: Pecan Latte
steps: Put the sugar and water in a ^saucepan$. Bring the mixture to boil, then add the pecans and salt.
Let the mixture simmer for 15 minutes. Remove from heat and let the mixture cool.
Add the mixture to a blender along with the butter. Blend until smooth.
Add 2 tsp into espresso based drinks. Top the drink with some whipped cream, chopped pecans, and drizzle the syrup.
